instruction: Suggest the most helpful study habits for a student preparing for an upcoming English Literature exam.
output: The best study habits for a student preparing for an upcoming English Literature exam include reading the assigned literature and class notes thoroughly, outlining key points and ideas in the literature and taking part in study groups or one-on-one discussions with classmates. Additionally, it is important to take frequent practice exams to help identify areas of weakness. Other helpful habits include breaking the material into smaller chunks for more manageable study sessions and using mnemonic devices to help memorize numbers, dates, and facts.
